messages.content: I always feel so bad for [NAME] when I watch this scene.
This is so cringey it hurts. I feel so bad for whoever sent this because they are so stupid.
The comments on this thread are what I expected and that makes me sad.
I am trying they try to say I’m fake even though I’m trying it’s painful to talk to them sometimes
Gonna be sad when Gameday is inside a gym for shooty hoops. I already miss CFB :(
Sadly there's a good chance that you still need a car anyway because that affordable neighborhood will involve a one hour commute.
I really pity those unfree Cuban babies. It’s just sad.
Hold my wine, I have to go vomit in sorrow.
it's hurting my heart :( why did you leave me
This is exactly what it's been like. I feel personally victimised by it all
He also had bipolar depression, which was a major driver in his mental states...
My husband and I have been circling the drain for years. :(
Y'all i have option one. Lemme tell you. Sex is important. I miss it
Please post any news you may find about her fate. This is so sad and so wrong. We need to know what happens to her.
That's sad. I'm 16 and where I am there are loads of athiests my age. It's great.
She had really bad chronic back pain from what I can remember, so was self treating with alcohol
I can relate. It kind of breaks your heart and your spirit, doesn’t it?
